channel.title: CVE Feed for ifmeorg -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ifmeorg -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-25991|2024-09-16T19:57:24.579Z -- ifmeorg -- ifme
item.description: In Ifme, versions v5.0.0 to v7.32 are vulnerable against an improper access control, which makes it possible for admins to ban themselves leading to their deactivation from Ifme account and complete loss of admin access to Ifme.

item.title: CVE-2021-25992|2024-09-16T16:53:23.213Z -- ifmeorg -- ifme
item.description: In Ifme, versions 1.0.0 to v.7.33.2 don’t properly invalidate a user’s session even after the user initiated logout. It makes it possible for an attacker to reuse the admin cookies either via local/network access or by other hypothetical attacks.

item.title: CVE-2021-25990|2024-09-16T18:50:25.583Z -- ifmeorg -- ifme
item.description: In “ifme”, versions v7.22.0 to v7.31.4 are vulnerable against self-stored XSS in the contacts field as it allows loading XSS payloads fetched via an iframe.
